document_data.name: ''Halberd of Swift Admonition''
document_data.creator: [[Laeral Silverhand]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''halberd of swift admonition''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[halberd]] crafted by [[Laeral Silverhand]] for [[Nayeli Goldflower]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of many pieces of so-called "[[Silverhand gear]]" crafted for [[adventurer]]s who helped to protect [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: Silverhand crafted the ''halberd'' to honor Nayeli's "gift of perspective" given her ability to recognize all actors who fell within the purview of her revenge mission, including those who supported or benefitted from her enemies' actions.
document_data.Powers: [[File:Halberd of Swift Admonition WoW wallpaper.jpg|260px|thumb|''Nayeli Goldflower wielding the ''halberd of swift admonition''.'']]The ''halberd of swift admonition'' could release a powerful [[smite]] that could strike not only the enemy in front of Nayeli, but also the enemies behind them.
document_data.Notable Owners: * Nayeli Goldflower, a [[paladin]] of [[Tyr]] to whom Silverhand also gifted the ''[[seal of righteousness]]''.
